response.summary:
Engineer with a passion for information technologies, with knowledge of JavaScript and Python, capable of creating elegant solutions in the shortest time possible, with a proactive attitude, good communication skills and the ability to teamwork.
I am a backend developer with 3 years of experience, proeficient using Django, FastAPI and Express frameworks, Postgres, Redis and Elasticsearch databases, I have knowledge about RabbitMQ and MQTT and other technologies like Docker and cloud services like AWS, also I hava experience using frontend frameworks like React and VueJS
response.skills: Computación en la nube, Automatización, GraphQL, AWS Lambda, AWS StepFunction, Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS), Kubernetes, Python (Programming Language), Linux, Docker, Mqtt, Amazon Web Services (AWS), TypeScript, Express.js, REST APIs, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, Redis, FastAPI, Django REST Framework
